title: How jQuery Works
description: Welcome to the jQuery documentation! This lab will give you an introduction to jQuery.

meta.title: Introduction to jQuery: Mastering the Basics
meta.description: Explore the fundamentals of jQuery, a powerful JavaScript library, and learn how to leverage its features to enhance your web development projects.
meta.keywords: javascript, javascript practice, javascript practice online, tutorials, jquery, javascript lab, javascript tutor, web development, programming
